Reviews.Title: Great Product for a great price
Reviews.Author: frequent shopper "Active Consumer"
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I expected it to do. I have four of them placed on each entrance of my house and they look like real cameras. My goal was to get something as a deterrent and these are perfect for what I wanted. Not sure why anyone would rate this less than 5 stars unless their expectations were to get the same thing out of the dummy camera, that you would in a real camera. I intend to buy two more and place them by my shed in the yard

Reviews.Title: Ingenious little thing!
Reviews.Author: M. A. Barnes "Georgia Peach"
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking if it doesn't look like much, I didn't have much invested in it.  But it is at our front door, winking its redlight on anyone who rings the doorbell and looks quite official.  And it comes with a sticker that says a surveillance camera is in use.A good  inexpensive ploy well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security cameras
Reviews.Author: L. Turner "cowboys2000"
Reviews.Content: This ranks up there with a recording of barking dogs!!! Not very useful in a REAL situation.Just Say No!!!!
